infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of your Labubu collection.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select photos for your Labubu collection.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you add photos to your Labubu collection.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos of your Labubu collection.
